snippet: Just 18 months after being taken private in a leveraged buyout, Burger King Worldwide Holdings, plans to list its shares on the New York Stock Exchange.
abstract: Just 18 months after being taken private in a leveraged buyout, Burger King Worldwide Holdings, plans to list its shares on the New York Stock Exchange.

byline.original: By PETER LATTMAN and MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Burger King to Return to Public Markets
headline.print_headline: Investment Firms to Take Burger King Public Again
